languages.text: "Я слышала рассказы от своих собратьев-изгоев... мрачные истории о Великом пожирателе. Боюсь, то были его посланцы — предвестники бури, от которой нет спасения".
"I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were its envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."
languages.original_text: "Я слышала рассказы от своих собратьев-изгоев... мрачные истории о Великом пожирателе. Боюсь, то были его посланцы — предвестники бури, от которой нет спасения".

traits.locale_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were his envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."
"I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were his envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."
"I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were his envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."
"I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were his envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

languages.text: “我从我的流浪者同伴那边听说过它们的事情……那些关于大吞噬者的可怕故事。我担心那些生物是它的使者，它们的出现恐怕预示着毁灭万物的风暴即将到来。”
languages.original_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were its envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

traits.locale_text: “我从我的流浪者同伴那边听说过它们的事情……那些关于大吞噬者的可怕故事。我担心那些生物是它的使者，它们的出现恐怕预示着毁灭万物的风暴即将到来。”

languages.text: « D'autres Errants m'ont raconté des histoires sinistres à propos du Grand Dévoreur. Je crains qu'il ne s'agissait là de ses émissaires, annonciateurs d'une tempête que nous ne pourrons éviter. »
languages.original_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were its envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

traits.locale_text: « D'autres Errants m'ont raconté des histoires sinistres à propos du Grand Dévoreur. Je crains qu'il ne s'agissait là de ses émissaires, annonciateurs d'une tempête que nous ne pourrons éviter. »

languages.text: «He oído historias de mis hermanos proscritos... siniestros relatos del Gran Devorador. Me temo que esos eran sus emisarios, precursores de una tempestad de la que nada podrá escapar».
languages.original_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were its envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

traits.locale_text: «He oído historias de mis hermanos proscritos... siniestros relatos del Gran Devorador. Me temo que esos eran sus emisarios, precursores de una tempestad de la que nada podrá escapar».

languages.text: 「仲間の追放者から聞いたことがある…グレート・ディヴァウアーにまつわる不気味な話だ。あれらはその使者なのではないか。逃れられぬ嵐の先触れではないかと危惧している」
languages.original_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were its envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

traits.locale_text: 「仲間の追放者から聞いたことがある…グレート・ディヴァウアーにまつわる不気味な話だ。あれらはその使者なのではないか。逃れられぬ嵐の先触れではないかと危惧している」

languages.text: "Ich habe Geschichten von anderen Ausgestoßenen gehört. Schreckliche Geschichten über den Großen Verschlinger. Ich fürchte, dass dies seine Gesandten waren, Boten eines Sturms, vor dem es kein Entkommen gibt."
languages.original_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were its envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Geschichten von anderen Ausgestoßenen gehört. Schreckliche Geschichten über den Großen Verschlinger. Ich fürchte, dass dies seine Gesandten waren, Boten eines Sturms, vor dem es kein Entkommen gibt."

languages.original_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were his envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

languages.text: "Başka Yurtsuzların başına gelenleri, Büyük Yutucu'ya dair acımasız hikâyeleri duymuştum. Bunların onun elçileri, sığınağı olmayan bir fırtınanın habercileri olmasından korkuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I have heard tales from my fellow Outcasts — grim stories of the Great Devourer. I fear those were its envoys, harbingers of a storm from which there is no escape."

traits.locale_text: "Başka Yurtsuzların başına gelenleri, Büyük Yutucu'ya dair acımasız hikâyeleri duymuştum. Bunların onun elçileri, sığınağı olmayan bir fırtınanın habercileri olmasından korkuyorum."
